messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] different approaches was: Family Guy
messages.msgSnippet: unschoolingbasics Yep, each of us will handle this differently -- how we express ourselves when our kids are into something we don t value. Here we see all
messages.messageBody:
unschoolingbasics
Yep, each of us will handle this differently -- how we express ourselves when our kids are into something we don't value.

Here we see all sorts of "dumb" things on TV. Some we watch and laugh at together -- love to hate that Ninja game show. :)

We also don't get bent out of shape when the other guy doesn't like something we like. We know the difference between liking a person and liking a TV show.

Nance




On Aug 7, 2008, at 3:40 PM, marbleface@... wrote:

> I am free to say I think it is dumb

I don't like people passing negative judgments (dumb, stupid, boring,
etc.) on what I like so I don't do it to the other people in my life.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
